RISK_ASSESSMENT.deal_risk_explanation: The deal is currently paused, with significant objections raised regarding pricing and budget constraints.
RISK_ASSESSMENT.churn_risk_explanation: High likelihood of switching to competitors due to budget constraints and the prospect exploring other vendors.
RISK_ASSESSMENT.timeline_risk_explanation: Concerns about immediate functionality and the prospect's urgency for a solution indicate potential delays.
RISK_ASSESSMENT.budget_risk_explanation: The prospect has set a strict budget limit of $90K, increasing the risk of the deal not being funded.

ACTIVITY_ANALYSIS.last_touch_summary: The last communication involved the prospect indicating a pause in discussions due to budget concerns.

events.event_description: The prospect raised objections regarding pricing and budget constraints.
The representative committed to revising the proposal to focus on rapid deployment.
Follow up on the revised proposal to check for interest.

AI_GENERATED_SUMMARY: The sales representative, Bruce Wayne, followed up on a proposal for Marketing Cloud Lite. The prospect, Emily Johnson, raised multiple objections regarding pricing, competitive comparisons, and a strict budget limit of $90K. Despite Bruce's efforts to address these concerns, Emily ultimately decided to pause the discussion, indicating she would only re-engage if her leadership expressed renewed interest.

Next_Steps: Revise the proposal to meet the budget constraints
Follow up with Emily to confirm interest after leadership review
Explore alternative pricing models or features
RECOMMENDATIONS.Escalation_Triggers: If no response is received within a week after the follow-up.
RECOMMENDATIONS.Deal_Acceleration_Tactics: Offer a limited-time discount or a phased rollout option.

Email_Draft.subject: Revised Proposal for Marketing Cloud Lite
Email_Draft.body:
Hi Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to follow up regarding our recent discussion about the Marketing Cloud Lite proposal. I understand the budget constraints and will aim to revise the proposal to align with your requirements.

Please let me know if thereâ€™s anything specific you would like me to include or focus on. Looking forward to your feedback!

Best,
Bruce

AI_GENERATED_FOLLOW_UP.Slack_Message: Hi Emily, just checking in on the revised proposal. Let me know if you have any updates!
